channel.title: Aragon DAO to MESG Integration: Milestone 2
channel.description:
This article is a continuation of MESG's ongoing integration with Aragon, connecting DAOs to to web services. See our previous report on Milestone 1.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/aragon-dao-integration-milestone-2/
